title: Ads Executive / Performance Marketing Executive
job_overview:
Ads Executive / Performance Marketing Executive
We’re looking for a performance marketer who’s obsessed with numbers and knows how to turn ad spend into measurable business growth. You’ll work closely with designers and analysts to hit conversion targets.

Requirements:

Hands-on experience running Facebook/Google campaigns

Analytical approach with comfort in Excel or Google Sheets

Basic creative sense to work with video/image teams

Please send your CV to: Upgrade to see actual info
We do not respond to messages via onlinejobs.
